page.title: 01EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
Most people in Wickwar are employed around the counties of Avon and Glouce stershire because Wickwar is situated on the border of Avon. The main employment areas are Bris tol,Avonmouth,Yate and other places. The village does not provide much employment Spar the main shop,a drap- er's, ther newsagents, the pub "The Buthay, two petrol stations and a soci al club. Below the playing field there is a trading esta consisting of two steel fabrication companies, a truck yard. Further down the road there is a cider factory.
At the moment there are{3,000,000} unemployed in England,yet in the south there is not quite as much unemploymen t as in the north.Luckily Wickwar is in the south.
